short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Fusion of Style and Functionality for Your Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with the Ekko Theme, designed to bring both aesthetics and functionality to your browser. This theme not only immerses you in Ekko’s world but also elevates your daily interactions with practical tools and intuitive features.

Dynamic Design Meets Practical Features

The Ekko Theme showcases a visually striking design inspired by the enigmatic champion. Whether you're a League of Legends fan or simply appreciate futuristic aesthetics, this theme brings an energetic, time-bending vibe to your browsing experience.

Shortcuts for Seamless Navigation

Save time and effort with the built-in shortcuts feature. Quickly access your favorite apps, websites, and social media platforms directly from your start page. This functionality ensures that your digital journey is always smooth and efficient.

Stay Organized with Bookmarks and Notes

Never lose track of important pages or thoughts. With easy-to-use bookmarks, you can organize and retrieve your favorite sites in an instant. The note-taking feature allows you to jot down ideas, reminders, or to-do lists directly within your browser, ensuring productivity is always just a click away.

Time Display for Better Management

Keep track of the current time effortlessly with the integrated clock. Whether you're scheduling tasks or staying on top of deadlines, this feature helps you manage your day more effectively without needing to check another device.

Customizable Themes for Your Mood

Adapt your browser’s look to match your style. The Ekko Theme includes customizable theme options, letting you switch between designs that best reflect your mood and preferences.

Experience a perfect balance of creativity and convenience with the Ekko Theme. Redefine the way you browse—install today and let your browser reflect the power and brilliance of Ekko.
